Class Record

java.lang.Object
simuletta.compiler.SyntaxClass
simuletta.compiler.declaration.Declaration
simuletta.compiler.declaration.scope.DeclarationScope
simuletta.compiler.declaration.scope.Record
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
public class Record extends DeclarationScope implements Externalizable
Record Declaration. 
Syntax:

                RecordDeclaration ::= RECORD record'identifier  invalid input: '<' : prefix'identifier >  invalid input: '<' RecordInfo >?
                                                        BEGIN CommonPart  invalid input: '<' VariantPart >*  END

                        RecordInfo ::= INFO "DYNAMIC"  |  INFO "TYPE"

                        CommonPart ::= invalid input: '<' AttributeDeclaration  >*

                        VariantPart ::= VARIANT  invalid input: '<' AttributeDeclaration  >+

                                AttributeDeclaration ::= Type attrid  invalid input: '<' , attrid >*

                                        attrid ::= attribute'identifier  invalid input: '<' ( repeat'IntegerNumber ) >?

S-Code:

        RecordDescriptor ::= RECORD recordTag:newtag invalid input: '<' RecordInfo >?
                                                  invalid input: '<' PrefixPart >? CommonPart
                                                  invalid input: '<' AlternatePart >* ENDRECORD

                RecordInfo ::= info "TYPE"   !   info "DYNAMIC"

                PrefixPart ::= PREFIX ResolvedStructure

                CommonPart ::= invalid input: '<' AttributeDefinition >*

                AlternatePart ::= ALT invalid input: '<' AttributeDefinition >*

                AttributeDefinition ::= ATTR attr:newtag QuantityDescriptor

                ResolvedStructure ::= StructuredType invalid input: '<' FIXREP count:ordinal >?

                StructuredType ::= recordTag:tag
Author:
Ã˜ystein Myhre Andersen

    • isSubRecordOf

      public boolean isSubRecordOf(Record other)
      Consider the Record definitions: 
       
     Record A   ......;
     Record B:A ......;
     Record C:B ......;
      Then Record B is a subRecord of Record A, While Record C is subRecord of both B and A.
      Parameters:
      other -
      Returns:
      Boolean true iff this Record is a subclass of the 'other' Record.
